title: Interpretation of a dream about crying loudly in a dream and crying about burning, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cryingThe interpretation of a dream about crying is considered one of the things that most express a person’s suffering and the burden of his worries. When we do not know how to express our feelings, we resort to intense crying and releasing negative energies into our lives. Interpretation of a dream about crying Studies have shown that the interpretation of a dream about intense crying is an expression of the psychological state and we inform you of that. Through the different website, crying is one of the best healthy ways that a person resorts to to get rid of his worries. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the dream of crying in a dream indicates the joy of entering a person’s life. If the crying is very loud with slaps or scars, it indicates sadness and crying, and it may It is an indication of a calamity for the household. As for crying in a dream, it is evidence of the death of worries and rain. Then crying shows longevity. Verses without sound or screaming indicate that he is close to Ibn Sirin. As for whoever sees himself crying with tears in his eyes, this is evidence of something. It is undesirable and has bad effects. Ibn Sirin interpreted crying as blood and not tears because it is a sign of sadness over an old matter that ended your life. Crying in a dream for single people. Seeing an unmarried woman crying a lot over Ibn Shirin is a sign of fatigue and difficulty in her life and she will soon suffer from hardships. Vision Tears in a dream, along with screaming and intense crying, indicate that the dreamer is under psychological pressure. However, if an unmarried woman sees many tears in her sleep without a loud sound or crying, this is evidence of the semi-relief that she will soon be happy with and will enjoy psychological and physical comfort. If an unmarried woman dreams of someone dying in a dream and she cries a lot, this is a sign of joy and happiness nearby. Crying loudly in a dream Often we dream that we cry on gloomy and annoying days. We see our eyes crying during sleep or we find them crying in front of us. We wake up in a state of extreme annoyance, anger, and extreme anxiety that changes the mood throughout the day. Dreaming of crying in a dream has many interpretations by sociologists and psychologists. Seeing crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin expresses the idea of ​​ending the bad and negative feelings that reside in our subconscious mind. Events due to the context of the dream may not be one of the reasons for crying. It is from the subconscious that works on emotional and mental balance to get rid of sadness and anxiety in our lives. Interpretation of crying loudly in a dream about a loved one. Ibn Sirin confirmed the interpretation that if a young man sees himself crying in a dream, this means That he will get married soon or God will allow him to travel abroad to the country he desires. A young man crying in a dream also indicates that he will reconcile with someone who is angry with him in reality. A young man who sees himself crying in a dream loudly and loudly is a sign of seeing an unjust Sarah. It is not desirable for a dead person to make a loud sound and cry in a dream or cry for a dead person in his condolences, and this is considered an unpleasant dream. Interpretation of crying over a dead person in a dream. We will tell you the interpretation of a dream about crying loudly in a dream as follows: It is known that crying in a dream is ugly to the person.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a wristwatch in a dream: The wristwatch is considered one of the necessary tools because it helps in making a schedule for daily tasks, apart from knowing the time of things, arranging appointments, and other things. However, the interpretations vary and differ depending on the shape and color of the watch in a dream except in the case of a social spectator. Seeing a wristwatch in a dream Dreaming: Dreaming of a new wrist watch symbolizes that the dreamer is doing good things and walking a straight path, avoiding deception and deception, and hating lies and staying away from them, while dreaming of a broken watch is a sign of being exposed to injustice and oppression from those around him. Seeing the watch with an unclear time and some scratches indicates heartbreak. And severe sadness, in addition to the emergence of many disputes and problems, and symbolizes the emergence of some health and psychological disorders. Seeing a wristwatch in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a wristwatch in a dream indicates many different interpretations, which are often considered bad and indicate the emergence of some evil and symbolize injury. Some problems are the result of some haters. Seeing a wrist watch in a dream symbolizes exposure to some problems and crises that will soon be overcome, or an indication of some psychological damage to the dreamer or something bad that happened to him and his family. A person who sees a wall clock falling to the ground in a dream It is a sign of the death of a family member or the appearance of some things that are not useful to him and affect him negatively. Seeing a wristwatch in a dream by Al-OsaimiImam Al-Osaimi believes that a wristwatch is a good dream that expresses the achievement of goals, and seeing it distorted in a dream indicates anxiety and problems, especially if its hands are broken. It moves more slowly than usual. Seeing a wristwatch in a dream for a single woman: When a virgin dreams of herself wearing a watch in a dream, this is a sign of her marriage contract with a person of high status and status. It also shows the suffering and severe pressure that the dreamer is experiencing and affecting her. In a bad way. Seeing an unmarried girl buying a watch is a sign of earning abundant wealth and means marrying a wealthy person with a high status in society or an indication of the ability of a visionary to bear responsibility and perform the duties required of him. Seeing a wristwatch in a dream for a married woman. Dreaming about a wristwatch in a dream indicates that the dreamer takes care of all the affairs of her home and children with all sincerity and love, and is a sign of her constant stress and exhaustion to improve living conditions and family comfort. Seeing the wife wearing a silver or gold watch is evidence that she is living In a state of happiness and that her partner is a generous person who wants to gain her approval. If the wife sees that the watch is falling in her dream, this is evidence of a serious illness or weakness and general weakness, but buying the watch symbolizes the many burdens that she bears and she cannot carry them all and she needs someone to support her. For her.Seeing a wristwatch in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees a wristwatch in a dream is a sign that the birth process is approaching or a sign that the viewer is suffering from some health problems during pregnancy and it also shows that this woman is worried about...

title: Interpretation of snow in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of snow in a dream for a married womanMost likely, a woman feels very happy if she sees snow in her dream, especially if she likes the usual winter weather and is very happy with it, as she finds great pleasure in the vision and you can see that she is playing and running. Pure white and beautiful snow, what are the most important meanings of seeing it in a dream for married and pregnant women? What are the most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin regarding the appearance of snow in a dream? We will discuss in the next.Interpretation of snow in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees a lot of white snow and snow in a dream, it can be emphasized that the good circumstances she faces in her life, either in terms of money and strong blessing with it, or broad psychological nourishment and tranquility with children and children. If she sees that snow is covering her house and is happy because of this beautiful sight, the family’s circumstances will improve and she will soon find the success of one of her children. Sometimes a woman faces some problems when snow appears in a dream, and from here come broad warnings from interpretation scholars, as she will face many bad events if she is exposed to To fall in the snow or this led to her serious illness. He was enjoying it.Interpretation of snow in a dream for a married woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin refers to many beautiful meanings that are confirmed by the appearance of snow in a dream for a married woman and shows what she faces in the near life with great pleasure in getting rid of fear or distress while improving her financial situation. He gives her what she desires and hopes for as quickly as possible. With the appearance of rain and snow in a married woman’s dream, the scholar Ibn Sirin shows that she achieves many achievements and gets rid of the pressure and enemies around her, and from it comes the disease, controlling her and making her sad. Confirmed. Interpretation of snow in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman can see a lot of snow in a dream, and this scene leads to great comfort and happiness, and in this case the topic shows the happiness that she is experiencing these days and the end of the problems or difficult days that she faces, so that she becomes happy and awaits her birth well, Most of the problems of pregnancy are far from her, so she will be completely happy and calm, God willing. If a pregnant woman eats snow in a dream and it never hurts her or she is not happy, this indicates her reassured psyche and the generous events that the days bring her, while if her teeth are severely hurt by the taste of snow, The meaning is not good, and it confirms the many fears that haunt her these days, except for a disturbance that may testify to her health and psychology, until she has bad surprises during childbirth, God forbid. Melting snow in a dream for a married woman. When seeing snow melting in a dream, the woman may feel some fear, and it speaks Scientists describe the meaning of this with praiseworthy signs, so its melting is a sign of getting rid of annoying situations and many pressures that exist between them and people. Those around her, and the husband may be among them, and on the other hand the woman’s life becomes happy and full of halal food and money, and she had some problems and disagreements, so she quickly escaped, God willing. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of a visit to a doctor in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a doctor in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that carry many interpretations that have been interpreted by scholars. Various psychological, social and health conditions for the visions, and in the following encyclopedia article we present some interpretations of seeing a doctor in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of visiting a doctor in a dream for a single womanIf a girl sees in a dream that she is going to the doctor, the dream indicates that this girl is going through a crisis and a dangerous experience and wants to It helps her overcome what she is in. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream recommended by a doctor is a sign that she will enjoy good health throughout her life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that the doctor entered her while she was sick, this indicates her recovery from the disease. And if he came to her while she was not Sick and in good health, this may be evidence of her illness or evidence of her broken engagement. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the doctor who treated her has died, this indicates the death of one of those close to her, such as her father and mother, and God Almighty knows best. In the event that an unmarried girl dreams that she She works as a doctor, which means that this girl will achieve everything she wants and will reach a high position. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream in a doctor’s office indicates a close marriage with a pious person and almost indicates joy. Interpretation of a doctor’s visit in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees her husband in The image of a doctor in a dream. The dream indicates her husband’s high status and position in life. For a married woman to see that a doctor enters her house in a dream, this is evidence that bad things will end. If there is a sick person in the house who is being treated and he has some problems and crises at home, this will end. And if the house is suffering from a lack of food, it will leave and abundant food will come. If a married woman sees in a dream that her doctor has died, then the dream indicates the death of people close to her. If a married woman sees her husband in a dream and needs a doctor, in the dream, this is a sign of That her husband needs help. If a married woman dreams of sending a doctor to someone, this indicates that he is a benevolent person who loves helping others. A married woman sees in her dream that the doctor goes to her children’s school, in the dream it is an indication of the possibility of the disease spreading in the school. Interpretation of a visit The doctor in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is visiting a doctor, then the dream is an indication that she will give birth in a short time. If a pregnant woman dreams that the doctor gave her some medicine and she took it, then the dream indicates that she will hear the happy news soon. If a pregnant woman sees A doctor's office in a dream, the dream is evidence of the arrival of many happy and good news, as well as the disappearance of worries. If a pregnant woman dreams that her doctor is going to die, then this in the dream is a sign that she will have a miscarriage or that her newborn will die after giving birth. If a pregnant woman sees her husband In a dream in the form of a doctor giving birth to her, the dream is evidence that her husband loves her very much and that he fears for her and wants to please her. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is medical

title: Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream about a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a beautiful girl, wearing clothes and with beautiful features, then that girl will also walk with her. This vision indicates that this girl will soon get engaged. Whoever loves her will propose to her, and she will live a beautiful life with him. If a girl sees in her dream a girl who was tired and going to the hospital, but she was beautiful. This vision indicates that this girl has people in her life who do not love her well. They are trying to destroy her and break her morale, but she will recognize them and stay away from them. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is walking with an attractive girl, she suddenly disappears. This vision indicates that this girl will suffer and experience a difficult time in her life, and that she has not completed her engagement and will break up with him. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a soft girl and walks beside her, but she is tired. This vision indicates that this girl will get sick. But she will overcome this illness. In the next few days, she will return to her normal life. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing children in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that she has a beautiful baby girl with blue eyes. This vision indicates that this woman will live a life Beautiful, full of hope and giving, and she will be happy soon. When a married woman sees in her dream that she has a beautiful daughter, and her behavior is beautiful and virtuous. This vision indicates that this woman is fair and raises her daughter with love and good morals, and that she is a good woman and has a good reputation among people. When a woman sees A married woman in her dream is that she is walking with a very beautiful girl, and she is happy. This vision indicates that this woman will hear the news of pregnancy soon. She will give birth to a nice and calm girl who carries the qualities of her mother. Whereas if a married woman sees an attractive girl in her dream, that girl is also asking for help. But that woman cannot do that. This dream indicates the number of problems that this woman will face in the coming days. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a man and its meaningIf a man sees in his dream that he is walking with a beautiful girl and her eyes are colorful. This vision indicates that this person will find... Permanent job soon. He will live a happy and stable life with his wife. When a man sees in his dream that he is playing with a girl who is calm and has beautiful features, this man is also happy to play with her. This vision shows that his wife will give birth to a girl and this girl will be charming and attractive and will have a good reputation among the people. Whereas, if a man sees in his dream a girl trying to walk, but she is unable to do so, then this man also helps. This dream indicates the ability of this person to get rid of all the problems and crises that he is suffering from soon, God willing. If a man sees in his dream a beautiful girl And tender, but she died, and this man was sad in a dream. This vision indicates that this man will grieve in his life over the loss of his mother. It will take a long time for his condition to improve, but it will improve with time. Read also: Seeing a handsome child in a dream for a married woman Meaning Seeing the beautiful girl

title: Interpretation of a dream about black shoes, the meaning of black shoes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing black shoes in a dream means meeting a partner with good specifications, whether he wears black shoes or loses them or buys new black shoes that are old or torn, or high heels, or wide, narrow flats, all dreams have a different interpretation. And Al-Nabulsi and more in the continuation of the topic: Black shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin Black shoes in a dream indicate marriage to a well-qualified man, so if you see yourself wearing black shoes in a dream, this means that you will soon marry a man you want very much. If you see black shoes that need If you see that you are wearing dirty black shoes and mud is stuck to you, this warns you of Problems and disputes. If a married woman sees herself wearing black shoes in a dream, this symbolizes the approaching pregnancy. Black shoes in a dream indicate marriage to a man who has good qualities, and shoes that need to be polished indicate the presence of problems in your life that need guidance, and they also indicate money. Ability and livelihood. Black shoes with mud on them indicate problems and disputes. If a girl sees a group of shoes and wants to choose what to wear, this indicates the number of suitors to marry her. But if a married man sees that he took off black shoes and put on new shoes, he will divorce his wife and marry a virgin. If there is A patch on a black shoe means he will marry a woman who has a child. If she is wearing black shoes that were previously dirty, then the dream is a connection with a woman who lost her husband due to death or divorce. If a married woman sees that she is wearing black shoes, and if she is pregnant, this indicates that she will give birth to a girl, If she is not pregnant, then it is a pregnancy for her. But if a man sees that he is moving between his shoes, this indicates that he is doing more than one job for himself. If a single young man sees that he is looking for shoes, then he is looking for a wife, but if he is married and does not have a job, then he is looking for work. If a girl sees that she is wearing black shoes that are wide and large for her size, then the husband for her is older than her and rich. Seeing smooth black shoes in a dream means that the dreamer will walk on the road and travel. Seeing black shoes cut off in the dreamer’s dream means that he will be exposed to something that prevents him from traveling and it will be His will in his travels according to the color of the shoes. If he sees that he has new black shoes in a dream and the woman’s wealth does not go in them, then wearing them means that he will be associated with that woman. Interpretation of black shoes in a dream. Ibn Sirin said that the girl who dreamed of seeing black shoes in a dream, and this girl is suffering from problems With her family, it indicates that this girl needs help and guidance from a healthy and understanding person, so she should seek help from her without hesitation. As for the girl who sees black shoes while working and putting in effort, this indicates that she will obtain a great livelihood and a lot of money. The interpretation of the vision came. Black shoes in a dream with many

title: Interpretation of Laylat al-Qadr in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the Night of Power in a dream is considered one of the praiseworthy interpretations, as it is one of the most beautiful nights of the year that Muslims experience in the blessed month of Ramadan. A thousand months ago, the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, dreamed of it, but when he woke up, he forgot the dream and did not tell us when it was, but advised us that it was the last ten days of the month of Ramadan. Its owner is good, so today I presented an encyclopedia of interpretation of the Night of Power in a dream for single women and pregnant women as well as for married women, so follow us ... Interpretation of the Night of Power in a dream The Night of Power was mentioned in the Holy Qur’an that it is better than a thousand months, and the angels descend upon it to hear the supplications of Muslims to God and their supplications, until they asked for mercy and forgiveness from God Almighty until the sun rises good and happiness, God willing, but it varies from one case to another according to the state in which it is. Interpretation of a dream of seeing the Night of Power for a single woman Ibn Sirin believes that it is one of the visions that bring goodness and happiness in the life of singles: If she loves a man and will marry him soon and will be a good husband, it also shows that she will meet a good man and marry him and it will be a successful marriage. The Night of Power symbolizes the arrival of goodness and comfort almost, in addition to some good changes that occur in the girl’s life. Interpretation of seeing the Night of Power in a dream for a married woman Seeing the Night of Power means pregnancy and childbirth soon, if she does not have children. The Qur’an also mentioned the Night of Power in the best deeds in this world and its conclusion. Commentators also see it as evidence of her happiness and abundance of strength in life with her husband. Her physical condition has improved significantly And a great start for all worries, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Night of Power outside of Ramadan The vision of the Night of Power indicates many beautiful and commendable interpretations, which benefit its owner with good and great: If a patient sees the Night of Power in his dream, this is evidence of a short recovery from his illness. If a person sees himself calling on God on the Night of Power, this is a sign of good conditions and that God will improve his end. When a poor person dreams of the Night of Power in a dream, this is evidence that his financial situation will improve soon and all problems will be solved, God willing. The Night of Power in a prisoner’s dream is a sign of his acquittal of the charges against him and his release from prison. When you see our master Muhammad and read the Qur’an on the Night of Power, this is evidence of goodness, abundance of livelihood and blessings in your life, as well as relief from all worries and problems and repayment of debts. It also indicates heading to the right path in life and feeling safe and comfortable. Interpretation of the Night of Power for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees the Night of Power in her dream, this is evidence of happiness, abundance of livelihood and blessings in her life. It also indicates that she will do well and safely after giving birth. And her vision was also interpreted that God will bless her With a boy at birth. In the end, seeing the Night of Power in a dream indicates all the conditions of its owner with abundant sustenance, kindness, and some changes that will change the dreamer’s life for the better, God willing, but this vision cannot be relied upon to a large extent, as they are rulings.

It also indicates that she will do well and safely after giving birth. Seeing it is also interpreted as meaning that God will bless her with a boy at birth. In the end, seeing Laylat al-Qadr in a dream indicates all the conditions of its owner, with abundant sustenance, kindness, and some changes that It will change the dreamer’s life for the better, God willing, but this vision cannot be relied upon to a great extent, as it is rulings.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something for a married woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking something for a married woman. One of the strange and suspicious dreams at the same time is seeing a dead person in a dream, so we will consider the most important words on the subject of interpretation. From a dream about a dead person asking something from a living person. Interpretation of a dream about a dead man asking something for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking something for a married woman. If a wife sees a dream with a dead person asking her for something, then there are different opinions in interpreting a dream about a dead man asking something for a married woman, which are as follows: If a married woman dreams that Mita asks her about one of her sons, as this is not a good sign, because this indicates that one of her sons will experience some health problems or severe exhaustion in the coming years. But this judgment will succeed, God willing. When a married woman sees a dead man in a dream asking for something dear to her, it means that this woman is being robbed or cheated in something in her life or work, or it also means that this woman will lose a lot of money. If A married woman saw a dead person giving her a blanket in a dream, which means that this woman will suffer from instability in her married life with her husband and this will expose her to some problems, but she will overcome them. Interpretation of a dream about the dead asking for something from the living When this person asks for something from the sleeping person, the dreamer wants an interpretation Dreaming of the dead, and asking something from the living. A website offers various interpretations and interpretations of this dream by leading interpreters. Dream interpretation symbols of a dead person asking for somethingInterpretation of a dream of a dead person asking for something for a married womanWhen you see a dead person in a dream and ask for something, this vision is generally a message, warning, or request from the dead person to the fortuneteller. Talking to a dead person in a dream is a reflection of the dreamer's desire to know his place in the afterlife. Or it is a sign of the dreamer’s intense love for the dead. Some dream interpretation scholars also explain that this vision is evidence of the deceased’s need for alms and calls for forgiveness and mercy. Or it is a sign of death that a problem or crisis is solved by the sleeper in his real life. It is possible that the vision of the dead person is asking for something. In the dream, it is a sign of the dreamer’s piety and purity from the sins he has previously committed, and good news for him that his repentance will be accepted. Whereas if the deceased asks for something that he owned in his life, the interpretation of the dream is that it was wrong to divide his property, or give it to someone who does not deserve the inheritance. If the deceased asks Something strange that cannot be understood. The vision is a warning to the monarch that he is wasting his life and money on something that does not benefit him, and alerts him to rethink the affairs of his life. In most interpretations of seeing the deceased asking for something from the dead, the dead person’s need is for prayer, charity, and doing charitable works for his soul. In the interpretation Ibn Sirin interprets the dream as the good status of the deceased in the afterlife. However, if the dead person asks for something forbidden, this is evidence of his poor condition due to the many sins in his life. The interpretation of a dream about the dead asking for something from the living varies depending on the thing that the deceased is asking for, in addition to the events and details of the dream. Below

title: Interpretation of a dream about a blue phone

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a blue phone in a dream. You ask what is the interpretation of dreaming about a blue phone in a dream? We show all of this and more, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations..Interpretation of a dream about a blue phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about having a blue phone in a dream, and buying a new blue phone can indicate Something disrupts the life of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. When you see a black phone, it can lead to victory, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a girl buying a black phone, this may indicate victory, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen buying a red phone, this may lead to good news, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream A phone falling to the ground in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a phone falling to the ground in a dream could be evidence of losing money, and God knows the unseen. It could also indicate the inability of the dreamer to achieve goals, and God is Most High and Most High. Why did the dreamer see the screen falling and breaking? This may lead to problems faced by the dreamer. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about breaking my phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about breaking my phone in a dream can lead to the loss of money, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married man ringing on the phone, it may express obstacles that prevent you from achieving goals, and God knows best. Also, breaking the phone can indicate marital problems, and God knows best. I know the interpretation of a dream about a new phone in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a new phone in a dream can be a sign of good news, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself buying a new mobile phone, it may lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself buying a new phone in a dream, it may be a sign of stability, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation Dreaming of a black cell phone in a dreamInterpretation of dreaming of a black cell phone in a dream can be a sign of victory over enemies, and God knows best. If a young man sees a black cell phone in a dream, this may indicate comfort, and God knows the unseen. When you see a black cell phone, it can express a mood of trouble, and God is Most High. And I know, if a single girl sees a black cell phone in a dream, this may be a sign of goals that are difficult to achieve, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about finding a cell phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about finding a cell phone in a dream could be a sign of fulfilling desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a single girl sees, finding a phone Cellular can lead to achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself finding a mobile phone, this may indicate achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. When she sees finding a mobile phone, this may indicate the return of a person from a trip, and God is the Most High and Knows. Interpretation of a dream about an old mobile phone in a dream. It can The interpretation of a dream about an old mobile phone in a dream indicates old relationships, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the old mobile phone, it may lead to poverty, and God knows the unseen. Just as a single girl sees an old cell phone, this may indicate distress, and God knows the unseen. When she sees an old phone broken down, it may indicate This leads to crises with one of the people you are related to
